title: Lydia Bright reveals ex Lee Cronin is heavily involved with her pregnancy and attends her baby scans
text:
She shocked fans when she revealed she'd split from Lee Cronin at the same as announcing her pregnancy.

Yet Lydia Bright has revealed that her ex is still heavily involved in her life and pregnancy during a Q&A session with her fans on Monday.

The former TOWIE star, 29, took to Instagram to share a snap from her last baby scan appointment, where she had been joined by Lee for the appointment.

Amicable: Lydia Bright revealed her ex Lee Cronin is still heavily involved in her pregnancy as she shared a snap of the pair at her last baby scan during a Q&A with her fans on Monday

Asked whether Lee is an 'active part' of her unborn baby's life, Lydia responded: 'Our baby was very much planned and we are both very excited for her arrival.

'Lee has been at every scan. Here we are with our midwife Justine.'

Another fan then probed: 'If Lee is involved and it was planned, why are you not together?'

The reality star replied: 'So many questions about me and Lee. I have learnt that things don't always plan out the way you hoped and life isn't always perfect and that's ok.

'I get so many messages from women who are in similar situations to me. My only advice is not to be bitter, focus on the miracle growing and whatever will be will be…..'

Words of advice: Lydia told her followers in a 'similar situation', 'My only advice is not to be bitter, focus on the miracle growing and whatever will be will be…..'

Elsewhere in the Q&A, Lydia revealed that her sister Georgia was the first person she told about her pregnancy, before gathering the rest of her family the next day to make the big reveal.

Lydia also added that although she had always been close with pal Lucy Mecklenburgh, the pair were even closer now because Lucy is also expecting her first child, with boyfriend Ryan Thomas.

Lydia announced in August that she was expecting her first child, a daughter, with her ex-boyfriend Lee Cronin in February next year.

While Lydia is pleased to become a first-time mother, the star confirmed she split from her long-term partner Lee after being in a relationship for more than two years.

The couple first briefly parted ways in January with Lydia confirming they had split for good in August.
description: She shocked fans when she revealed she'd split from Lee Cronin at the same as announcing her pregnancy.
